description: Integrate your AI models with SourceSync.ai's knowledge management platform. Seamlessly manage, ingest, and search your documents while leveraging external services for enhanced data retrieval. Empower your AI with organized knowledge and efficient document management.

capabilities.name: validateApiKey
capabilities.description: Validates the API key by attempting to list namespaces. Returns the list of namespaces if successful.

capabilities.name: createNamespace
capabilities.description: Creates a new namespace with the provided configuration. Requires a name, file storage configuration, vector storage configuration, and embedding model configuration.

capabilities.name: listNamespaces
capabilities.description: Lists all namespaces available for the current API key and optional tenant ID.

capabilities.name: getNamespace
capabilities.description: Retrieves a specific namespace by its ID.

capabilities.name: updateNamespace
capabilities.description: Updates an existing namespace with the provided configuration parameters.

capabilities.name: deleteNamespace
capabilities.description: Permanently deletes a namespace by its ID.

capabilities.name: ingestText
capabilities.description: Ingests raw text content into the namespace. Supports optional metadata and chunk configuration.

capabilities.name: ingestFile
capabilities.description: Ingests a file into the namespace. Supports various file formats with automatic parsing.

capabilities.name: ingestUrls
capabilities.description: Ingests content from a list of URLs. Supports scraping options and metadata.

capabilities.name: ingestSitemap
capabilities.description: Ingests content from a website using its sitemap.xml. Supports path filtering and link limits.

capabilities.name: ingestWebsite
capabilities.description: Crawls and ingests content from a website recursively. Supports depth control and path filtering.

capabilities.name: ingestConnector
capabilities.description: Ingests all documents in the connector that are in backlog or failed status. No need to provide the document ids or file ids for the ingestion. Ids are already in the backlog when picked thorough the picker. If not, the user has to go through the authorization flow again, where they will be asked to pick the documents again.

capabilities.name: getIngestJobRunStatus
capabilities.description: Checks the status of a previously submitted ingestion job.

capabilities.name: fetchDocuments
capabilities.description: Fetches documents from the namespace based on filter criteria. Supports pagination and including specific document properties.

capabilities.name: updateDocuments
capabilities.description: Updates metadata for documents that match the specified filter criteria.

capabilities.name: deleteDocuments
capabilities.description: Permanently deletes documents that match the specified filter criteria.

capabilities.name: resyncDocuments
capabilities.description: Reprocesses documents that match the specified filter criteria. Useful for updating after schema changes.

capabilities.name: semanticSearch
capabilities.description: Performs semantic search across the namespace to find relevant content based on meaning rather than exact keyword matches.

capabilities.name: hybridSearch
capabilities.description: Performs a combined keyword and semantic search, balancing between exact matches and semantic similarity. Requires hybridConfig with weights for both search types.

capabilities.name: createConnection
capabilities.description: Creates a new connection to a specific source. The connector parameter should be a valid SourceSync connector enum value. The clientRedirectUrl parameter is optional and can be used to specify a custom redirect URL for the connection. This will give you a authorization url which you can redirect the user to. The user will then be asked to pick the documents they want to ingest.

capabilities.name: listConnections
capabilities.description: Lists all connections for the current namespace, optionally filtered by connector type.

capabilities.name: getConnection
capabilities.description: Retrieves details for a specific connection by its ID.

capabilities.name: updateConnection
capabilities.description: Updates a connection to a specific source. The connector parameter should be a valid SourceSync connector enum value. The clientRedirectUrl parameter is optional and can be used to specify a custom redirect URL for the connection. This will give you a authorization url which you can redirect the user to. The user will then be asked to pick the documents they want to ingest. This is useful if you want to update the connection to a different source or if you want to update the clientRedirectUrl or if you want to pick a different or new set of documents.

capabilities.name: revokeConnection
capabilities.description: Revokes access for a specific connection, removing the integration with the external service.

capabilities.name: fetchUrlContent
capabilities.description: Fetches the content of a URL. Particularly useful for fetching parsed text file URLs.
